summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4882 for the improvement of 39th Avenue Southwest, from West Juneau Street to West Myrtle Street and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55993 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
